content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 56-63)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) connected to pipe at (-8.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) with fuel inventory (34/50 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) producing 13,500 kW
- Connected pipe network (water system ID 1331, steam system ID 1333)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) containing 200 coal
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (fueled with 19 coal, operational)

### Oil Extraction and Storage System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) working at 100% efficiency (299,980 crude oil remaining)
- Storage tanks at:
  - (22.5, 40.5) containing 17.74 crude oil
  - (27.5, 40.5) containing 1.70 crude oil
  - (32.5, 40.5) containing 0.12 crude oil
  - (37.5, 40.5) empty (new status)
- Connected pipe network (crude oil system ID 1334) spanning 18.5,38.5 to 35.5,41.5
- Power network (ID 7108) with 468 small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Inspection Errors
- Failed to inspect storage tank at (22.5,40.5) due to nil value access
  - Verify entity exists before inspection
  - Add null checks for inventory inspection operations

### System Monitoring Improvements
- Implement automated alerts for:
  - Boiler fuel levels below 20 coal
  - Storage tank capacity thresholds
  - Pumpjack efficiency drops

### Maintenance Procedures
- Scheduled inspections every 4 hours for critical systems
- Implement fuel reserve monitoring
- Create emergency drill schedules

### Expansion Planning
- Verify all placement locations meet:
  - Terrain requirements (land only)
  - Resource availability
  - Proper spacing constraints
  - Power network coverage

### Automation Recommendations
- Implement automated fuel delivery system
- Add solar power supplementation
- Create backup water supply line
- Establish advanced oil processing
